short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds random backgrounds to stackoverflow and stackexchange

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you spend most of your time on stackoverflow? Are you bored of the same old white background? Well, not anymore! 

With StackBack you see a different background image every time you visit another page on stackoverflow. These images are randomly retrieved from the unsplash api, so there'll be a huge variety of different backgrounds.

Current Features:
- Get a random background when you're browsing stackoverflow
- Set a custom search query to receive backgrounds related to something you love!
- Adjust content filter strength to stay safe.
- Set a custom background to any image on the web

Do you really really like a certain background? The image's unsplash page and link are provided in the developer console.

Release Notes (1.6):
- Added the ability to adjust filter strength
- Added the ability to enter a custom search query
- Improved settings page ui
